articles.author: Oli Smith
articles.title: Joe Biden blunders yet again with bizarre claim he has been US President 'for 15 months' - Daily Express
articles.description: US PRESIDENT Joe Biden has bizarrely claimed that he has been in charge of the country for 15 months - instead of five - in the latest gaffe from the American leader.

articles.author: Ryan McCrimmon, Martin Matishak
articles.title: How ransomware hackers came for Americans’ beef - POLITICO
articles.description: Virtually no mandatory cybersecurity rules govern the millions of food and agriculture businesses that account for about a fifth of the U.S. economy. And now, the risk has become real.
